entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
